OrgPaymentPracSummary.name: OrgPaymentPracSummary
OrgPaymentPracSummary.description: Represents the payment practice information to external parties that an organization discloses as part of ESRS G1 - Business conduct.

Country.description: The country of operation for which this record captures the payment practices.

Description.description: The description of the company's payment practices to disclose as part of ESRS G1 - business conduct.

DisclosureReportingPeriodId.description: The unique identifier of the reporting period.

G1AvgNumberDaysPayInvoice.description: The standard contract average number of days to pay an invoice.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.
